SCTX:
begin Sotha_SothaSil

short state
short doOnce

if ( menumode == 1 )
	return
endif

;this part sets the weather back to normal after endgame

if ( GetJournalIndex TR_SothaSil >= 100 )
	if ( doOnce == 0 )
		ModRegion "Mournhold Region" 25 35 5 20 10 5 0 0
		ChangeWeather "Mournhold Region" 1
		set doOnce to 1
	endif
endif

;this part sets up endgame
if ( OnActivate == 1 )
	if ( state == 0 )
		messagebox "You have found the body of Sotha Sil, his lifeless hulk dangling from a contraption of his own making. Someone has obviously been here before you." "Ok"
		Journal TR_SothaSil 50
		set state to 1	
	endif
endif


end
